articles.description: The ground for front-of-pack-labelling in India was laid in 2010, when in response to a PIL, the Delhi High Court asked FSSAI to strictly regulate junk food.

articles.title: Copper prices plunge to 17-month low on recession fears - Markets Insider
articles.description: The metal, which is considered a bellwether of the global economy, is coming off its worst quarter since 2008.
articles.content:
Copper moved below $8,000 per ton as part of a broader rout in metals sparked by global 
recession fears.
